title: Corrigendum to “Interleukin-1β and tumor necrosis factor-α augment acidosis-induced rat articular chondrocyte apoptosis via nuclear factor-kappaB-dependent upregulation of ASIC1a channel” [Biochimica et Biophysica Acta 1864/1 (2018) 162–177]
